official_title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require as a condition of participation under the medicare program that hospitals provide parents of newborn children with information and recommendations on childhood immunizations.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require as a condition of participation under the Medicare program that hospitals provide mothers of newborn children with information and recommendations on childhood immunizations.

titles.title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require as a condition of participation under the medicare program that hospitals provide parents of newborn children with information and recommendations on childhood immunizations.
